segments.text: I see the cookies in the jar, and I can't help but feel a bit envious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are clearly excited about their secret cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how innocent their joy is, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, thereâ€™s a twinge of sadness as I realize their actions are risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is completely unaware of their mischief, lost in her own routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their giggles, echoing in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene encapsulates childhood wonder, but also a lack of understanding of consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
